extensionName.message: Keepnet Allow List Assistant for Office 365

extensionDescription.message: Automatic allowlist configuration assistant for Keepnet phishing simulations in Office 365 - Smart navigation, real-time validation and evidence collection

extensionTitle.message: Keepnet Allow List Assistant - Click to Start

congratulationsDesc.message: With these steps, you've successfully whitelisted IP addresses in your Office 365 environment and configured security simulations, spam filtering, and Advanced Threat Protection (ATP) features!

safeLinksWarning.message: If Safe Links is not visible:

safeLinksWarningDesc.message: You can skip this step and proceed to the next steps.

licenseRequired.message: Information: Required Licenses for Safe Links Feature

licenseRequiredDesc.message: Safe Links feature is only active with the following licenses:

workflowStep1Description.message: Make sure you are on Microsoft Security Center and proceed.

workflowStep8Description.message: You can enter these domains: signin-authzone.com, verifycloudaccess.com, akibadem.org, isdestek.org, gartnerpeer.com, global-cloud-llc.com, cloudverification.online, accountaccesses.com, shoppingcenter.site, hesapdogrulama.info, banksecure.info, meetingonline-us.com, digitalsecurelogin.co, secureloginshop.net, encryptedconnections.info, trendyoll.club, kurumsalgiris.com, yoursecuregateway.com, securemygateway.com, hadisendekatil.com, updatemyinformation.com, secure-passchanges.com, swift-intel.com, hepsibureda.com, securely-logout.com, sigortacilarbirligi.com, btyardimmasasi.com, sirketiciduyuru.com, bilgilerimiguncelle.com, securelogout.com, securelinked-in.com, theconnectionsuccess.com, sigortacilikhizmetleri.me, securebankingservices.net, guvenlibankacilik.com, insurance-services.me, btservisleri.com, secureloginonline.net, insan-kaynaklari.me, getaccess.store
